thread.title: Joy Villa Wears Trump Dress at the Grammys
thread.title_full: Joy Villa Wears Trump Dress at the Grammys

author: Debra Heine
title: Joy Villa Wears Trump Dress at the Grammys
text:
Pop Singer Joy Villa made a dramatic and unforgettable entrance at the 2017 Grammy Awards Sunday. She arrived wearing a simple white dress -- which she removed on the red carpet, revealing a glitzy, patriotic gown featuring Donald Trump‚Äôs ‚ÄúMake America Great Again‚Äù presidential campaign slogan on the front and "Trump" written on its train in big, blingy letters.
The dress was a sensation.
Haters on Twitter immediately reacted by ridiculing Villa with mean tweets, some accusing her of wearing the Trump dress simply for publicity. The "blue check-mark mafia" was especially hostile.
But... why, Joy Villa? #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/IiQwsbhKVu
‚Äî TV Guide (@TVGuide) February 12, 2017
Attention seeking @Joy_Villa is cancelled #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/CTm868QCvk
‚Äî Karen Civil (@KarenCivil) February 12, 2017
who the fuck is Joy Villa and why is she wearing that godawful Trump dress at the #Grammys ??
‚Äî Kevin Allred (@KevinAllred) February 12, 2017
nope. https://t.co/VgdQJYd8Aq
‚Äî deray mckesson (@deray) February 12, 2017
I don't know who this is wearing House of Deplorable, y'all. https://t.co/vCjneEVc87
‚Äî Michael Arceneaux (@youngsinick) February 12, 2017
ELLE Magazine panned the dress, along with a couple of other outrageous outfits.
The most over-the-top outfits from the #GRAMMYs : https://t.co/dBKWyb3kAI
‚Äî ELLE Magazine (US) (@ELLEmagazine) February 13, 2017
The 25-year-old, who was not nominated for a Grammy, describes herself as a ‚Äúvegan‚Äù and a ‚Äúfeminist‚Äù in her Twitter bio. She wrote on Instagram that her "whole artistic platform is about love."
üí•My whole artistic platform is about LOVE!üé∂üíïüíã I couldn't be where I am today without the love and tenderness of those beautiful supporters and friends around me. Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è I hope you enjoy tonight's @grammysawards2017 and remember to forget your problems and focus on your future! You are infinite and beautiful and no one can stop you but you. üíãSo go out and celebrate yourself as a winner no matter what, together with those you adore! #happygrammysday #blessings #beautiful #love #grammys2017üíù #happyvalentinesday #celebration #style #postivevibes #love
A photo posted by Joy Villa (@joyvilla) on Feb 12, 2017 at 12:40pm PST
She said, "sometimes you just gotta be free to express yourself." And express herself she did:
Sometimes you just gotta be free to express yourself. thank you to all of my supporter‚Ä¶ https://t.co/08AGXxG5zy pic.twitter.com/S286YuONhE
‚Äî Joy Villa (@Joy_Villa) February 13, 2017
??#grammys2017 @realdonaldtrump Dress by @officialandresoriano @mwprinc https://t.co/FyH0xcwzTi pic.twitter.com/mJ6Pr5uGEx
‚Äî Joy Villa (@Joy_Villa) February 13, 2017
??#grammys2017 @realdonaldtrump Dress by @officialandresoriano @mwprinc https://t.co/pWb6UWhQtD
‚Äî Joy Villa (@Joy_Villa) February 13, 2017
On her YouTube channel, Villa promotes herself as an actress, singer-songwriter, painter, vegan, competitive bikini bodybuilder, and certified nutritionist.
She is known at the Grammys for wearing outlandish outfits that make the worst dressed list.
